definition: to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
Snow (name)/Edgar Snow (1905-1972), American journalist, reported from China 1928-1941, author of Red Star Over China

pinyin: Bu4 yi2 nuo4 si1 Ai4 li4 si1

sentences.english: She eventually chose a photographer as her date on the show.
sentences.chinese: 最終，馬諾在節目裏選擇了一名攝影師約會。

sentences.english: Even so, the peace activists of the day reacted to the news of his Nobel Prize with mortification.
sentences.chinese: 當時的和平活動家們也對他成爲諾獎得主感到恥辱。

sentences.english: Noverre began ballet-making as it is known today.
sentences.chinese: 諾弗爾開始編導出我們今天所看到的芭蕾舞。

sentences.english: Coach Novellino always plays with the same line-up.
sentences.chinese: 諾維利諾總是用相同的球員首發。

sentences.chinese: 諾維利諾總是用相同的球員首發。

sentences.english: He often fails to keep his word.
Climate-sensitive reds such as pinot noir are also in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 黑皮諾之類的氣候敏感型紅葡萄酒也會陷入困境。

sentences.english: National health agencies, Schecter added, need to step up with better oversight.
sentences.chinese: 阿德諾博士補充道，國家衛生機構需要加強監督。

sentences.english: They include the endangered Mexican Wolf and giant Saguaro cactus.
sentences.chinese: 包括了瀕危的墨西哥狼和巨大的薩掛諾仙人掌。

sentences.english: Auspicious Sarah with na, go looking for tile made, o said na to seduce and repairing.
sentences.chinese: 吉雅莎拉着娜諾去找瓦立阿，說娜諾勾引撒修。

sentences.english: Dr. Tononi is also testing his theory in other ways.
sentences.chinese: 託諾博士同時也用其他的方式測試他的理論。

sentences.english: Noble winney owned a very good all-band receiver.
sentences.chinese: 諾布爾溫尼有一臺非常好的全波段收音機。

sentences.english: The stylistic vision of this wine is an "Oregon version" of Alsatian Pinot Gris.
sentences.chinese: 此款酒用俄勒岡產阿爾薩斯白皮諾釀造。

sentences.english: Robinovitz pushed past the queue jamming the passageway outside the infirmary .
sentences.chinese: 羅賓諾維茨擠過在醫務室門外阻塞了通道的長隊。

sentences.english: Nitinol is one of the most extraordinary metals to be discovered this century.
sentences.chinese: 鎳鈦諾是本世紀發現的最特別的金屬之一。

sentences.english: I see Nordstrom's stock is down again today.
sentences.chinese: 我看到諾德斯特龍百貨的股票今天再次下跌。

definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal
